file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 26-23-04-05 - BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT FIRE EXTINGUISHER SYSTEM TWO-WAY CHECK TEE VALVE - ADJUSTMENT/TEST

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT FIRE EXTINGUISHER SYSTEM TWO-WAY CHECK TEE VALVE - ADJUSTMENT/TEST EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the check of the two-way check tee valve. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY CLASS-C BAGGAGE TWO-WAY CHECK TEE VALVE - FUNC- 26-23-04-700-801-A ♦ COMPARTMENT TIONAL CHECK EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 26-23-04 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-23-04-700-801-A EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 2. TWO-WAY CHECK TEE VALVE - FUNCTIONAL CHECK A. General (1) To do the check, it is necessary to remove the two-way check tee valve. (2) To do the task, refer to the instructions in Pacific Scientific Abbreviated CMM. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM TASK 26-23-04-000-801-A/400 TWO-WAY CHECK TEE VALVE - REMOVAL AMM TASK 26-23-04-400-801-A/400 TWO-WAY CHECK TEE VALVE - INSTALLATION Pacific Scientific Abbreviated CMM ATA 26-21-34 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the electronic compartment 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the BAGGAGE FIRE EXTG circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) Put the ladder in the work area. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 26-23-04 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Open access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100) to get access to the electronic compartment. (4) Remove the two-way check tee valve ( AMM TASK 26-23-04-000-801-A/400). J. Functionally Check Two Way Check "Tee" Valve SUBTASK 720-002-A (1) Do a check on the two-way check tee valve. Refer to the last revision of the Pacific Scientific Abbreviated CMM ATA 26-21-34. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the two-way check tee valve (AMM TASK 26-23-04-400-801-A/400). (2) Close access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (3) On the circuit breaker panel, close the BAGGAGE FIRE EXTG circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. (4) Remove the ladder from the work area. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 26-23-04 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
